entry.title: Solana Reckons With Seven-Hour Outage After Bot Swarm

entry.summary: So, the Yuga Labs Otherside sale took place this weekend and if you hadn’t noticed, it basically clogged up Ethereum so badly that the entire network had to stop and wait for the insanity to end before it could resume doing all the other important business it had to do.
